headline: GE HealthCare expands invasive cardiology solutions portfolio with AltiX AI.i for elevated experience in catheterization lab and electrophysiology procedures
summary: CHICAGO, March 17, 2025--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) today announced the launch of the AltiX AI.i edition of Mac-Lab™, CardioLab™ and ComboLab™. The AltiX AI.i editions are designed to improve the user experience, elevating workflow in the cardiac catheterization (cath) lab and supporting even the most complex electrophysiology (EP) procedures. These latest editions offer new features that can streamline workflow and enhance interoperability, while upholding strong cybersecurity standards.
